metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6826 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Mozilla developers Tyson Smith, Bob Clary, and Alexandru Michis reportedmemory safety bugs present in Firefox 74. Some of these bugs showedevidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort someof these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 75.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
